title: Contemporary Zambia Embassy District Retreat
description: In the heart of the embassy district of Zambia's capital, InterContinental Lusaka, an IHG Hotel, is an oasis of rest and relaxation for the discerning traveller. In close proximity to most government and corporate offices, the modern hotel is the ideal venue for travellers looking to unwind and rest after a hard day of work. Unwind at the Makumbi Club Lounge or revitalise yourself at the outdoor pool and fitness centre.
